name: Heated Eyelash Curler Premium PRO - Fast Heat up in 8s - 24 Hours Long Lasting - Rechargeable Electric Eyelash Curler with Type-C, Innovative L Sillicone, 2 Heat Modes, Grey White
about_this_item: Carefully designed for safety: this heated eyelash curler features a 15° anti-burn comb and a precise brush head for perfect curls. Its thermal protection slot prevents skin contact, ensuring quick, long-lasting, and safe eyelash makeup

2-Position Temperature and LED Display: The Acavado heated eyelash curler has two temperature settings, 65 °C (149 °F) and 85 °C (185 °F), and an LED display. Easily switch temperatures with a button, ideal for all lash types and styles

10s Fast Heating & Long-lasting Curl: The eye lash curler heats up in 10s. Its curved silicone design, used with mascara, separates lashes for a natural look. Achieve a deep, natural curl lasting 24 hours, enhancing your eyes effortlessly

Intelligent Power Off & Type-C Charging: The electric eyelash curler automatically powers off after 5 minutes of inactivity for safety. It is Type-C rechargeable, saving battery costs and allowing charging anywhere, making it ideal for home and travel

5-Star Aftersale Services: The heated eye lash curler, beautifully packaged, is a perfect gift for Mother's Day, Thanksgiving, Christmas, anniversaries, or birthdays. For any questions or defects, contact us via Amazon message. We offer 24/7 support.
